Funeral Guadalupe Spanish Prayer Sympathy Cards

Best Price! Funeral Guadalupe Spanish Prayer Sympathy Cards – Sympathy Cards Funeral Guadalupe Spanish Prayer Sympathy Cards products with good quality, you can be confident Funeral Guadalupe Spanish Prayer Sympathy Cards quality products Our Lady of Guadalupe Tribute Prayer Cards

In honor of your beloved departed and their profound devotion to Our Lady of Guadalupe, we present the Our Lady of Guadalupe Tribute Prayer Cards. Each card features the iconic image of Our Lady of Guadalupe, radiant with celestial light and adorned with heavenly stars. With the divine image of Our Lady of Guadalupe on the front and a cherished photo of your loved one on the back, these prayer cards serve as a reverent tribute to their memory.

Divine Intercession: As you behold the image of Our Lady of Guadalupe, may you feel her loving presence and divine intercession in your life. Let her radiant gaze and outstretched hands remind you of her unfailing compassion and maternal protection, guiding your loved one’s soul to eternal peace and grace.

Heavenly Comfort: Our Lady of Guadalupe is a source of solace and strength for all who seek her intercession. May her loving embrace envelop your heart with peace and consolation, knowing that your beloved departed is cradled in her tender care and sheltered beneath her mantle of grace.

Heartfelt Tribute: Each card pays homage to the deep faith and devotion of your loved one, depicted alongside the image of Our Lady of Guadalupe on the front. On the back, alongside their photo, there is space for a personalized message or prayer, allowing you to express your profound love and gratitude with reverence and devotion.

Eternal Blessings: As you hold these prayer cards in your hands, may you feel the gentle embrace of Our Lady of Guadalupe and the comforting presence of your cherished departed. May their memory be a beacon of hope and faith, guiding you through life’s journey with courage and grace.

Embrace the spiritual legacy of Our Lady of Guadalupe through the Our Lady of Guadalupe Tribute Prayer Cards, a sacred tribute to a life touched by divine grace and blessed with heavenly protection. Price:$21.15
